data.title: St. Anne's Belfield School
data.meta_description: St. Anne's Belfield School giving societies pay tribute to the amazing group of donors dedicated to helping fulfill the School's mission.
data.text:
The Sustainers’ Society celebrates those extraordinary donors who have given a gift to any area of the School for 20 or more consecutive years. We gratefully acknowledge the following members of the Sustainers’ Society who have demonstrated their financial commitment to our community for the past two decades and beyond, and we applaud this year’s new members whose names are emboldened below.

We also congratulate the following donors on reaching new giving milestones of 5, 10, and 15 years. We are grateful for all that their generosity has made possible over the years.
